This game is a run and gun spray and pray first person shooter with no strategy what so ever! So who could like it? Well anyone with an itchy trigger finger! This is on of the best fast pace fps with no stop destruction! The only time I remember no fighting was for 2 seconds and then utter (moo) chaos was unleashed! It is a great game.                      

8.5/10

P.S. It is more fast paced than COD Advanced Warfare if you can belive it!

[i]-"И так! Я хочу поиграть в coop режим в Quake! Заходим туда!
                              -Введите адресс сервера и хрен знает какую команду что бы зайти на сервак 
-Что?"[/i]
Эта игрушка абсолютно убирает эту проблему! В ней её нет! Там тебе дают нормальный список серверов!
И это Quake! С HD-моделями оттуда и игровыми моделями из Half-life!
Но всё равно стоит сказать про геймплэй!
Идёшь и стреляешь во всё то что движется! Потому что движутся только твои враги! Это соревнование кто кого больше укокошит. Мне очень нравится!
Но есть один большой минус - Нет игроков. Людей очень мало и не с кем не поиграешь.

I bought this out of "I-want-something-else-to-play" boredom, that plan went downhill quick. When they say this game is dead, it's actually dead. Last time i went one there was only 4 servers. I'm sure this would be an awesome game (I love quake) if it wasn't dead, but since it is, I don't reccomend it.

Don't expect rocket jumping to be like TF2. It will be less than half the height with you almost dead.

But not as dead as this game.

Nevertheless, it is fun, but I'd avise getting it in a sale instead of buying it by itself.

Decent fun; essentially, it's Quake on GoldSource with Half-Life player models. Map selection isn't bad. Multiplayer's less lively than the wreckage of the Titanic, but this can be circumvented if you're willing to endure the headache of installing a multiplayer bot mod like HPB Bot.

Overall rating: 7/10

Always was and always will be fps fun!  (a tribute to quake.)  Just started to play this again in 2015....brings back tons of memories when i played this back in 2009 doing research for my college paper on FPS Gamers.  Fast and crazy fun.  The grapple hook servers are awesome!

Despite the lack of a community, this game is really, really good.

It's basically quake on goldsrc.

It can run on a toaster (although for max settings and good framerate get a microwave)
It's semi-noob friendly.

If you have no experience with quake games, get Quake Live. It will help you prepare for this.

In my first 5 minutes of playing I was able to get 3rd place on the leaderboard and find a server with 4 people in it.

Fast paced action and a great game. I'd only buy it with Valve Complete or Source Multiplayer. It's not really a good standalone game.

Эта игра - своего рода дань уважения другой самой первой успешной мультиплеерной игре по которой устраивали турниры, к которой клепали карты, ради которой покупали первые Pentium'ы, да диковенные Vodoo c 4-мя мегабайтами на борту и которую и так все прекрасно знают. Что сказать? Гемплей очень бодрый, веселый и в хорошей компании способен изрядно доставить даже сейчас.

This is a tribute that Valve has made to id Software for their influence on multiplayer. Deathmatch Classic is basically QUAKE multiplayer, with HALF-LIFE character models. It is some fun multiplayer, but there are very few, if any, players in the servers. There is one server that I found that has bots on it, but then the next map was one that I couldn't download or something. So unless this is on sale, you are a fan of id Software, and you enjoy QUAKE multiplayer I wouldn't recommend this. But it is still a really cool tribute to id Software.

[h1] The Most Obscure Valve Game... And It Is FUN [/h1] 

Deathmatch Classic, what is it? Its Quake's multiplayer in the Goldsrc engine, and thats it.

All of Quake's weapons have been reskined and look awesome. very high res. DMC also has a few but good maps, also we get into the main problem with DMC, The population.

No One Plays This Game

I was the only one on the game, playing with bots, i also found 2 other people playing on that same server so nice.

Overall Deathmatch classic is a great little steam sale pick up, when its on sale you can get for a dollar. 8/10

I bought this game because it reminds me of good old days of Quake deathmatch. If you are an hardcore Quake 1 multiplayer fan, then this is one advanced Quake for you! There are a few active servers but once you join one, the players are going to come. So stop reading reviews and try it yourself, it worth it!
